attributes.action: Public Inquiry in to why Veterans' protests are being ignored and not reported!
attributes.additional_details: Freedom of speech and freedom of peaceful protest and their right to be heard.  WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON?
attributes.background:
Peaceful Rolling Thunder and the Veterans' March - Ignored!

Eco-Mentalists breaking the law and getting hundreds of arrests - front page news!


This needs a public enquiry - this is not meant to be an oppressive state!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for editorial decisions taken by media companies.
